info.title: AlumniServices
info.description:
Web Service for Alumni Services

# Environments
| API Version | Key Type | WSO2 URL | Environment |
| ----------- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| v1 | Sandbox |  | Development |

# Provisioning System Access

This API is controlled by the authorization measures defined in the PeopleSoft HR environment.

# Authentication

Applications must be subscribed to the API in WSO2 and use the application bearer token in all requests.

<SecurityDefinitions />
